tools.name: FastAPI
tools.description: FastAPI framework, high performance, easy to learn, fast to code, ready for production

tools.name: SQLAlchemy
tools.description: Python SQL toolkit and Object Relational Mapper

documents.title: FastAPI Introduction
documents.content: FastAPI is a modern, fast (high-performance) web framework for building APIs with Python 3.6+ based on standard Python type hints.

documents.title: SQLAlchemy Tutorial
documents.content: SQLAlchemy is the Python SQL toolkit and Object Relational Mapper that gives application developers the full power and flexibility of SQL.

queries.text: How to create a FastAPI application?
queries.expected_answer: To create a FastAPI application, you need to import FastAPI and create an instance of it.
SQLAlchemy is a Python SQL toolkit and Object Relational Mapper that provides database functionality.
